title: अभिनेता सूरज पंचोली की दोस्त की तस्वीर दिशा सालियान बताकर हुई शेयर
subtitle: सोशल मीडिया पर बॉलीवुड अभिनेता सूरज पंचोली के साथ खड़े कुछ लोगों की तस्वीर वायरल हो रही है। तस्वीर शेयर करने वाले यूज़र का दावा है कि वायरल तस्वीर में
author: hindi.newschecker.in
vclaim: Complete bullshit!! #FuckYouFakeMEDIA Is this the media we are supposed to trust?? That girl in the picture which was clicked in 2016 is not “Disha Salian” that is my friend @agaur21 (Anushri Gaur) who doesn’t even live in India .. Please stop brainwashing people and PLEASE stop harassing me and dragging me into this ! Start being responsible of your actions as it can ruin someone’s life ! I have said this before and I’m saying it again “I have never met or spoken to Disha Salian in my life” Seriously FUCK YOU AND FUCK YOUR FAKE NEWS! 🖕🏽 I’ve had enough.
